user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Security Setup
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and session management.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system allowing customers to securely log in using multi-factor authentication (MFA). Ensure session timeout, password management, and device recognition are properly implemented. Security measures should comply with banking industry standards to protect sensitive financial data. Implement encryption in transit and at rest, and establish secure logout and recovery mechanisms.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface Design
epics.summary: Create responsive, user-friendly interfaces for all device types.
epics.description: Design and develop a modern, accessible, and responsive web application ensuring seamless user experiences across desktop, tablet, and mobile. Implement intuitive navigation, clear layouts, and consistent design standards. The interface should adjust dynamically to various screen resolutions and orientations while maintaining accessibility best practices for all user demographics.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Management
epics.summary: Develop a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products and services.
epics.description: Implement a customizable user dashboard that presents personalized information and banking products based on customer profiles and eligibility. Integrate account and profile management functionalities, allowing users to update personal information, view account summaries, and access tailored offers. Ensure that data privacy and access permissions are enforced.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to submit account opening and service requests through guided workflows.
epics.description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow customers to submit new account opening requests, modify existing service details, and manage requests efficiently. Simplify processes with minimal clicks and a guided step-by-step experience. Support auto-save for incomplete applications and resume functionality. Include document upload capabilities for necessary verifications and integrate approval processes.

epics.title: Notifications and Real-Time Status Updates
epics.summary: Provide real-time request tracking and email notifications for user updates.
epics.description: Build a notification system to keep customers informed about the status of their account openings and service modification requests. Deliver real-time status tracking within the portal and send automated email or SMS updates at key workflow stages. Ensure reliability and accuracy in communication channels by integrating the system with the bank's messaging and notification infrastructure.

epics.title: Interaction History and Data Logging
epics.summary: Maintain comprehensive logs of all customer interactions and activities.
epics.description: Develop a logging mechanism that captures detailed records of all user interactions, service requests, and completed processes. Ensure auditability for compliance purposes by tracking timestamps, user actions, and workflow outcomes. The system must allow customers to view their interaction history securely while maintaining strict privacy controls.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking Systems
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking infrastructure.
epics.description: Establish seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank's existing core banking platform. Develop APIs or middleware to facilitate secure data exchange for account information, product eligibility, and real-time transaction status updates. Ensure scalability, reliability, and compliance with the bankâ€™s operational standards and data protection policies.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
epics.summary: Configure access levels based on user roles and authorization.
epics.description: Implement a robust role-based access control (RBAC) system ensuring customers only access features and data permitted to their profile and authorization level. Define access control rules for customer roles, service representatives, and administrators. Integrate the RBAC system into workflows, dashboard elements, and data retrieval processes for enhanced security and compliance.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to authenticate using multi-factor authentication, so that my account is more secure.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User should be able to enable and configure MFA.
2. MFA configuration should be secure and compliant with industry standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wants to enable MFA, When the user navigates to the security settings, Then the user should see an option to enable and configure MFA.

user_stories.title: Implement Session Management
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want my sessions to time out after inactivity, so that my account remains secure.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. System should automatically log out users after a period of inactivity.
2. Users should be notified when their session is about to expire.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is logged in, When the user stays inactive for a defined period, Then the system should log out the user automatically.

user_stories.title: Implement Password Management
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want the ability to manage my password, so that I can change it regularly for better security.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users should be able to change their passwords.
2. Password changes should comply with complexity requirements.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wants to change their password, When the user navigates to password settings, Then the user should be able to change their password securely.

user_stories.title: Implement Device Recognition
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want the system to recognize my device, so that login experiences are more secure and convenient.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. System should recognize known devices after the first login.
2. System should notify the user if a new device attempts to log in.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user logs in from a new device, When the device is detected for the first time, Then the system should notify the user about the new device login.

user_stories.title: Create Responsive Design for Desktop
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the web application to be responsive on desktop, so that I can have a seamless experience.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The web application should adjust its layout dynamically on desktop.
2. Navigation and content display should be intuitive and clear on large screens.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the web application on a desktop, When the user navigates through the application, Then the layout and content should adjust appropriately.

user_stories.title: Create Responsive Design for Tablet
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the web application to be responsive on a tablet, so that I can have a seamless experience.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The web application should adjust its layout dynamically on a tablet.
2. Navigation and content display should be intuitive and clear on medium screens.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the web application on a tablet, When the user navigates through the application, Then the layout and content should adjust appropriately.

user_stories.title: Create Responsive Design for Mobile
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the web application to be responsive on a mobile device, so that I can have a seamless experience.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The web application should adjust its layout dynamically on a mobile device.
2. Navigation and content display should be intuitive and clear on small screens.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the web application on a mobile device, When the user navigates through the application, Then the layout and content should adjust appropriately.

user_stories.title: Implement Personalized Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant banking products and services.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard should display personalized information and offers based on customer profiles.
2. Customers should be able to customize their dashboard view.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer logs into the account, When the customer views the dashboard, Then the dashboard should display personalized information and offers.

user_stories.title: Implement Account and Profile Management
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to manage my account and profile information, so that I can keep my personal details updated.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers should be able to update personal information such as contact details.
2. The system should enforce data privacy and access permissions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer wants to update profile information, When the customer navigates to profile management, Then the customer should be able to update their personal details.

user_stories.title: Implement Tailored Offers
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to view tailored banking offers, so that I can find products that meet my needs.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers should see offers tailored to their profiles and eligibility.
2. Offers should be updated based on customer's banking behavior.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer logs into the account, When the customer views tailored offers, Then the customer should see offers relevant to their profile.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a guided workflow for opening a new account, so that the process is simplified.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The workflow should guide users step-by-step through account opening.
2. The workflow should support auto-save and resume functionality.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer wants to open a new account, When the customer follows the guided workflow, Then the customer should be able to complete the process efficiently.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a guided workflow for modifying existing services, so that the process is simplified.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The workflow should guide users step-by-step through service modifications.
2. The workflow should support auto-save and resume functionality.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer wants to modify a service, When the customer follows the guided workflow, Then the customer should be able to complete the process efficiently.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement Document Upload Capability
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to upload documents for verification during workflows, so that my requests can be processed.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users should be able to securely upload necessary documents.
2. Uploaded documents should be integrated into approval processes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer needs to submit documents, When the customer follows the workflow, Then the customer should be able to upload documents securely.

user_stories.title: Implement Real-Time Status Tracking
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I know their progress.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The system should provide real-time status updates for customer requests.
2. Status tracking should be reliable and accurate.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer submits a request, When the customer tracks the request status, Then the customer should see real-time updates.

user_stories.title: Implement Email/SMS Notifications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email or SMS notifications about my request updates, so that I am informed.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The system should send automated notifications at key stages.
2. Notifications should be accurate and reliable.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer submits a request, When the request reaches key stages, Then the system should send email or SMS notifications to the customer.

user_stories.title: Implement Interaction History Logging
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a log of my interactions for audit purposes, so that I can review my activities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The system should log detailed records of all user interactions.
2. Customers should be able to view their interaction history securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer performs actions, When the customer views interaction history, Then the customer should see all logged interactions.

user_stories.title: Ensure Auditability for Compliance
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want detailed audit logs for compliance purposes, so that I can ensure regulatory requirements are met.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The system should capture timestamps, user actions, and outcomes.
2. Audit logs should be comprehensive and secure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user actions are performed, When an administrator reviews audit logs, Then all required information should be available and secure.

user_stories.title: Develop APIs for Data Exchange
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want APIs to exchange data with core banking systems, so that the integration is seamless.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. APIs should facilitate secure data exchange for account information and transactions.
2. APIs should be scalable and reliable.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the need for data exchange, When the APIs are used, Then the data should be exchanged securely and seamlessly.

user_stories.title: Ensure Compliance with Data Protection Policies
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want the integration to comply with data protection policies, so that sensitive information is secure.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The integration should comply with data protection policies.
2. Sensitive information should be secured during data exchange.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the need for data protection, When the integration is in use, Then sensitive information should be secure and compliant.

user_stories.title: Define Access Control Rules for Customer Roles
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to define access control rules based on customer roles, so that only permitted features and data are accessible.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Access control rules should be defined for customer roles.
2. The system should enforce these rules consistently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer accesses the system, When the access control rules are applied, Then the customer should only access permitted features and data.

user_stories.title: Integrate RBAC in Workflows
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want RBAC integrated into workflows, so that access controls enhance security and compliance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. RBAC should be integrated into workflows and dashboard elements.
2. The system should enforce RBAC rules during data retrieval processes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given workflows are in use, When RBAC is implemented, Then the system should enhance security and compliance by enforcing rules.
